fullName.jp: ウォーリア・オブ・ラ

description.en: A Warrior of Light who suddenly appeared in the world during a time of darkness with a crystal in hand. After defeating Garland and rescuing Princess Sarah of Cornelia、 he embarks on a long journey to restore light to the crystal and return peace to the world as the prophecies foretold.
description.jp:
暗黒に染まる世界に クリスタルをたず
さえて現れた「光の戦士」。
コーネリアの王女セーラをさらった
ガーランドとの戦いを皮切りに長い探求
の旅を通して クリスタルの輝きを取り
戻し 予言どおり 世界に再び光をもたら
した。

jp.text: 我々は 共に戦う仲間だ
仲間の危機を\n見過ごすわけにはいかない
力を合わせれば\n成し遂げられるはずだ
クリスタルよ\nこの世界に祝福を……
この世界に希望を……\n光を繋ごう
宿命は ここで終わる

gl.text: I could not pass by knowing that my comrades were in danger.
With our strengths joined as one、 we can achieve what we must.
May the crystals bless our world...
We、 too、 bestow upon this world a similar gift. The light shall be passed.

name.jp: シャイニングウェーブ

desc.en:
2-HIT ranged BRV + HP attack
BRV potency increases based on party's [Shield] values
Greatly restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt, up to 10% of Max HP
Upon recovering HP, excess is converted to BRV
Monderately raises Speed for 5 turns
desc.gl:
2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack
BRV damage increased based on total resistance value of party's active Shield effects
Greatly restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 10% of MAX HP
HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
Moderately increases SPD for 5 turns
desc.jp:
2HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
味方全員に付与されている「シールド」の
総耐久値に応じてBRV威力アップ
与えたHPダメージに応じて味方全員のHP大回復
回復量の上限は それぞれの最大HPの10％分
対象の最大HPを超えてHPが回復した時
超えたHP分 対象のBRVに加算
5ACTION自身の素早さを中アップ
素早さアップ（非表示）

desc.en:
Raises Party BRV based on Initial BRV
+ 8-HIT ranged BRV + HP attack
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
Inflicts [Lock] to all targets for 5 turns
Grants special effect [Guardian Shield] for 5 turns
For 7 turns, grants [Shield] equal to 300% of Initial BRV

While [Guardian Shield] is active
• Slightly raises party Initial BRV, Max BRV and Attack
• Moderately raises party Defense
• Reduces HP damage taken by party members based on the remaining value of [Shield]
* Same special effects do not stack

name.jp: シャインシールドエクステンド

desc.en:
[Shining Shield] use +2

When using [Shining Shield]
• Raises party BRV by 50% of Initial BRV
• Moderately improves the BRV Multiplier effect and extends it to party
• Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Greatly improves effects of [Shield] and extends its duration by 2 turns
• [Shield] is granted to party
• Integrates Max BRV Up, Attack Up and BRV Regen into [Will of Light] and extends its duration by 2 turns
• Triggers an HP attack after use

While [Will of Light] is active
• Turns [BRV Attack] to [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Initial BRV
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
• Turns [HP Attack] to [HP Attack+]
　∟ Raises BRV Based on Initial BRV
　∟ + melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

While [Will of Light] is active and 3 [Shield] buffs are active
• Turns [BRV Attack+] to [BRV Attack++]
　∟ Moderately raises BRV potency
• Turns [HP Attack+] to [HP Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Slightly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
desc.jp:
「シャインシールド」の使用回数＋2

・BRV乗算前に 対象のBRVを初期BRVの50％分追加し
　味方全体化
・対象へのBRV乗算量を中アップし味方全体化
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限はそれぞれの最大BRVの120％分
・「シールド」付与を味方全体化し
　効果大アップと2ACTION期間延長
・「最大BRVアップ」の効果が味方全体化し
　味方全員の攻撃力小アップと
　BRVリジェネの効果が追加された

　さらに2ACTION期間延長

・通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
　-BRV攻撃前に味方全員に
　　自身の初期BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算

　　合計BRV威力も中アップ

 　近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　 上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

「光の意志」付与中　かつ
味方全員の「シールド」の数が合計3個の時
・「BRV攻撃＋」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　以下の効果が追加
　-BRV威力中アップ
・「HP攻撃＋」が以下の「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　以下の効果が追加

　　合計BRV威力も小アップ
　-加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する

　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　 上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
